import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import Moment from 'react-moment' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Paper, Button, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' const styles = { paper: { width: 'auto', padding: '2%' } } const ExperienceDashboard = props => { const { experience, deleteExperience } = props const experiences = experience.map(exp => ( {exp.title} {exp.from} )) return ( Experience Credentials {experiences}
Race Date
) } ExperienceDashboard.propTypes = { experience : PropTypes.array.isRequired, deleteExperience: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default ExperienceDashboard
